name: Cyanotype Daydream -The Girl Who Dreamed the World
name_original: Cyanotype Daydream -The Girl Who Dreamed the World
description:
This is the story of the girl who dreamed the world.

A pure love story that utilizes the medium of visual novels to tell its story in a unique and unforgettable way.
Having received overwhelmingly good reviews from Japan, Laplacian is now proud to bring over this touching story to their fans all over the world through Steam.

This is the story of a man and a woman, or rather...
The story of three pairs of men and women, which stories will be selected at random once you start the game.







After experiencing these stories and bidding "farewell" to them, the stories converge in the truth of one girl.
We are thrilled to share with you the love story that has moved the hearts of thousands in its home country, Cyanotype Daydream.

[STORY]

Kaito wakes to find himself in a strange room with no memories of who he is or how he got there. Only two beds, white walls, and a taciturn girl named Yonagi. Upon learning of his role in this room, he immerses himself into three wondrous dream worlds with Yonagi. When all three stories meet a bitter end, Kaito recovers his memories, and the true story unfolds...
